content.rendered:
The school year is beginning, and the city is just now getting rid of the recent death of a golden young high school student – and nothing is as it used to be. Based on the characters of Archie Comics (Archie, Betty, Veronica, Josie of Pussycats), today’s series reveals the surreal side of small-town life, the darkness and strangeness that lurks behind the city’s idyllic disguise. There’s a young, singing seedling girl looking for a musical career here, a forbidden teacher-student relationship, a girl in love with her neighbor but shy, a new classmate coming to town, a stirring cool girl and of course secrets.”
Number of seasons: 6 (2017-2022)
Status: Finished
Creator: Roberto Aguirre-Sacasa
Channel: The CW
Starring: Lili Reinhart, Camila Mendes, Cole Sprouse
